newsitem.title: USA: Quote sells $2.5 mln in debenture.
newsitem.headline: Quote sells $2.5 mln in debenture.

text.p: CHICAGO, Nov 15 (Reuter) PC Quote Inc said it had entered into an agreement with Physicians Insurance Co of Ohio to sell the insurer $2.5 million in convertible debenture.
It said the insurer, which owns about 30 percent of PC Quote, would have the option to convert it into 1.25 million shares of PC Quote stock at $2 per share.
PC Quote said it had also agreed to offer its other shareholders the right to purchase 1.25 million shares at the same $2 per share price.
Following these two deals, it said its total number of common shares outstanding would increase to 9.8 million shares.
